quotes: You don't need to be 100% sure, you just need to be brave.
Live deliberately.
The days are long, but the years are short.
What you do is what matters, not what you think or say or plan.
He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
The cost of anything is the amount of life you exchange for it.
Time is the most valuable thing a man can spend.
Life is not short. You just waste a lot of it.
Don't count the days, make the days count.
Amor fati — love your fate.
Man is not worried by real problems but by his imagined anxieties.
It is not death that a man should fear, but never beginning to live.
The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
You have power over your mind — not outside events.
The impediment to action advances action. What stands in the way becomes the way.
Being busy is a form of laziness — lazy thinking and indiscriminate action.
Discipline equals freedom.
If you want to go fast, go alone. If you want to go far, go together.
How we spend our days is, of course, how we spend our lives.
You cannot overtake 90 percent of people by being 90 percent better — you do it by being different.
Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished.
All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us.
We suffer more often in imagination than in reality.
Don't let your reflection on the whole sweep of life crush you.
You will never find time for anything. If you want time, you must make it.
It's not the daily increase but the daily decrease. Hack away at the unessential.
The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
No surplus words or unnecessary actions.
When you arise in the morning think of what a privilege it is to be alive.
If it is not right, do not do it; if it is not true, do not say it.
Be so busy improving yourself that you have no time to criticize others.
Freedom is the oxygen of the soul.
Don't explain your philosophy. Embody it.
There is no greatness where there is not simplicity, goodness, and truth.
The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
To be calm is the highest achievement of the self.
Happiness depends upon ourselves.
Don't stumble over something behind you.
It is never too late to be what you might have been.
Nothing is worth more than this day.
If you're going through hell, keep going.
Be regular and orderly in your life, so that you may be violent and original in your work.
A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.
What we fear doing most is usually what we most need to do.
Success is the product of daily habits — not once-in-a-lifetime transformations.
You are the architect of your own destiny.
Everything you want is on the other side of fear.
A fit body, a calm mind, a house full of love. These things cannot be bought — they must be earned.
Do not pray for an easy life, pray for the strength to endure a difficult one.
The soul becomes dyed with the color of its thoughts.
Effort is only effort when it begins to hurt.
Most powerful is he who has himself in his own power.
What we do now echoes in eternity.
To accept our limited time is to step into a new relationship with life — one grounded in reality, humility, and depth.
